content: **knitted socks with flounce in drops fabel worked top down size 35-42 ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no fa-473 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** shoe size 35/37 - 38/40 - 40/42 foot length approx 22-24-27 cm **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100 g colour 100 off white **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 2 mm for rib needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size
